title: The Lost Destiny
description: After an encounter with a mysterious old man, 14-year-old Trinity Devineâ€™s whole world is turned upside down. When trinity wakes up one morning with a newfound spirit guardian and strange powers it all overwhelms her and she rejects even the mere thought of these powers. But after an incident caused by these mysterious new powers, she soon comes to find that whether she likes it or not she was destined for this.After one of her closest friends gets kidnapped by a demon sent to kill Trinity, her bravery and strength are put to the test when she sets out to save her best friend from the clutches of demons with the support of her mentor and her friend.
author: Kande S. Summers
